questions.question: わたしは　日本語（＿）　べんきょうしています。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～をべんきょうします - to study (something)

日本語 - Japanese language

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「日本語をべんきょうしています」 means "I am studying Japanese."

  • に - indicates direction or purpose, not object
  • が - marks the subject
  • と - means "with" or "and"
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is を.

  • に - indicates direction or purpose, not object
  • が - marks the subject
  • と - means "with" or "and"

questions.question: スーパー（＿）　たまごを　かいました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～で - indicates location of an action

かいました - bought

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「スーパーでたまごをかいました」 means "I bought eggs at the supermarket."

  • に - location of existence or destination
  • を - direct object marker
  • と - means "with"
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is で.

  • に - location of existence or destination
  • を - direct object marker
  • と - means "with"

questions.question: きのう　新しい　くつ（＿）　買いました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～を買いました - bought (something)

新しいくつ - new shoes

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「くつを買いました」 means "I bought shoes."

  • が - subject marker
  • に - indicates target or destination
  • へ - direction marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is を.

  • が - subject marker
  • に - indicates target or destination
  • へ - direction marker

questions.question: この　えいが（＿）　おもしろいですね。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～は - topic marker

おもしろい - interesting/funny

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「このえいがはおもしろい」 means "This movie is interesting."

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker, but topic is preferred here
  • に - indirect target, not suitable here
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is は.

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker, but topic is preferred here
  • に - indirect target, not suitable here
